text: The WebApp module doesn't come with a default script and makefile to allow static linking within Apache. Bojan Smojver <bojan@binarix.com> says it would be a nice feature to have
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text:
Bojan is right. Now that Tomcat 4.0.1 is out of the door, I'd rather reopen 
this and see what can be done.
creator: pier@betaversion.org

text: The webapp connector is no longer actively developed.
creator: remm@apache.org
